text: Pantea Panahiha at the 17th Iranian cinema celebration Pantea Panahiha () is an Iranian film and theater actress.http://karname.ir/Fa/professor/70/%D9%BE%D8%A7%D9%86%D8%AA%D9%87-%D8%A2-%D9%BE%D9%86%D8%A7%D9%87%D9%8A-%D9%87%D8%A7 == Selected Filmography == thumb *2020 – Exodus *2017 – Abji *2016 – In Silence *2016 – Red Lacquer *2016 – Duet *2016 – Breath *2016 – Aaaadat Nemikonim *2016 – Shahrzad *2016 – Arvand *2015 – Buffalo *2015 – Ginkgo: Suspended Narrative *2015 – I Am Diego Maradona *2014 – Gingko- the Suspended Narrative *2014 – Khanoom *2013 – Acre *2013 – Duet (Short) == References == == External links== * Category:1977 births Category:Iranian actresses Category:Actresses from Tehran Category:Living people
